about_the_game:
D.A.W.N: Darkness Awaits Withstand the Night is a fast-paced zombie survival game that puts you in the shoes of an elite survivor battling against the relentless undead. During the day, you strategize, gather supplies, and prepare your defenses. But when night falls, the real challenge begins as hordes of zombies emerge, driven by their hunger for human flesh.

Inspired by ‘I Am Legend’ and ‘World War Z,’ D.A.W.N offers an intense survival experience that blends action, strategy, and team-based gameplay. Explore a post-apocalyptic world, confront dynamic zombie evolutions, and adapt your tactics to outlast the ever-growing threat.

Key Features:

• Dynamic Day/Night Cycle: Gather resources, plan your strategies, and prepare defenses during the day to survive the night’s onslaught.

• Evolving Zombies: The longer the undead roam, the more dangerous they become. Face different tiers of zombies, each with unique abilities.

• Survival Simulation: No endless waves. Players must find extraction points to escape or face permanent death as their reanimated corpse joins the undead.

• Loadout System: Choose from a variety of weapons and equipment to suit your playstyle. Balance strengths and weaknesses to tackle various threats.

• Team Play: Join forces with others to survive the night, set traps, and fend off hordes in this open-ended survival simulation.

• Fast-Paced Combat: Engage in high-intensity battles that require skill, strategy, and quick reflexes.

Get ready to face the darkness. Will you survive until dawn?

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, gore, dismemberment, disturbing horror images/scenes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Q9450 @ 2.6GHz or AMD Phenom II X6 @ 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690 @ 3.5GHz or AMD FX-8150 @ 3.6 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 380x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
